__e: Those are the companions of the right.
And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient.
And be ye not like those who forgot Allah: and He made them forget themselves! Such are the rebellious transgressors! 19
Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
They are on (true) guidance, from their Lord, and it is these who will prosper. 5
You've been here a week, Mistress Bowen, and your only friends are these.
Your very presence will destroy the people you seek.
Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
And their families were taken care of.
If these had been gods, they would not have got there! But each one will abide therein. 99
Most of them will never understand, but I do and I think you do too.
A man who has friends like that will never really die.

5/Al-Ma'idah-60: Say: “Shall I inform you of what is worse than this and certain in retribution in the Presence of Allah? They are whom Allah has cursed and brought His Wrath upon, and of whom He made apes and swine and servants to Tâgût. These are worse in place and far more astray from the designed Way”.
These two have empty holes in their heads.
These are both under five? Under five, yeah.
The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
At least they'd be smaller than the others.
Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces,- they will be in an evil plight, and, as to Path, most astray. 34
